definitions.definition: To cause (something) to stick out or swell ; to extrude ; also, to cause (someone or something) to be covered in swellings .
To make (a design on a coin , an ornament on an object , etc.) stand out from a surface .
To represent (a subject ) on an object in relief ; also, of a design or subject: to stand out on (an object) in relief.
To decorate or mark (something) with a design or symbol in relief.
examples: The papers weren’t official until the seal had been embossed on them.

definitions.definition: To decorate (something) with bosses ( “ ornamental convex protuberances ” ) ; to boss ; hence, to decorate (something) richly .

subdefinitions.definition: To cause (something) to be prominent or stand out.
( obsolete ) To make ( speech , etc.) unduly bombastic or grand .

main_definition: To cause (something) to stick out or swell ; to extrude ; also, to cause (someone or something) to be covered in swellings .
secondary_definitions: To make (a design on a coin , an ornament on an object , etc.) stand out from a surface .
To represent (a subject ) on an object in relief ; also, of a design or subject: to stand out on (an object) in relief.
To decorate or mark (something) with a design or symbol in relief.
To decorate (something) with bosses ( “ ornamental convex protuberances ” ) ; to boss ; hence, to decorate (something) richly .

definitions.definition: ( intransitive , obsolete ) Of a hunted animal : to take shelter in a forest or wood .

( by extension , transitive , chiefly passive voice , obsolete ) To drive (a hunted animal) to exhaustion by chasing it; to exhaust ; hence, to make (a hunted animal) foam at the mouth due to exhaustion from being chased.

subdefinitions.definition: ( transitive , archaic ) To cause (an animal's body , a person 's mouth, etc.) to be covered with foam.
( transitive , obsolete ) To cause (someone, their heart or soul , etc.) to become extremely fatigued ; to exhaust.
( intransitive , obsolete ) Of a person: to foam at the mouth; also ( figurative ) , to be furious , to rage .

main_definition: ( intransitive , obsolete ) Of a hunted animal : to take shelter in a forest or wood .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , transitive , chiefly passive voice , obsolete ) To drive (a hunted animal) to exhaustion by chasing it; to exhaust ; hence, to make (a hunted animal) foam at the mouth due to exhaustion from being chased.

definitions.definition: To enclose or suit (a person ) in armour .
To enclose or surround (someone or something).

main_definition: To enclose or suit (a person ) in armour .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) To enclose or surround (someone or something).
